sentences: The last plenary of the CMP took place at 6:00 am on Sunday morning.
Vice-Chair Runge-Metzger presented a set of outstanding decisions.
Rapporteur Kranjc presented, and the CMP adopted, the report of the CMP (FCCC/KP/CMP/2011/L.1).
After adopting the resolution expressing gratitude to South Africa, the CMP was gaveled to a close at 6:22 am.
